snippet: Warner Fusselle, best known as the voice of Major League Baseball Productions and the guiding force for years behind "This Week In Baseball," died last week.
abstract: Warner Fusselle, best known as the voice of Major League Baseball Productions and the guiding force for years behind "This Week In Baseball," died last week.

headline.main: Game Loses One of Its Voices
headline.print_headline: Extra Bases: Game Loses a Voice
